documentation.author: Bush, Toni
documentation.purpose: Evaluate system data to determine if patient to see if there is an Active documented problems into the Core Measure PowerForms to document that VTE is confirmed by diagnostic testing.
documentation.explanation: VTE-6 core measure is in relation to documentation that the patient has a diagnosis of any VTE confirmed diagnosis.
documentation.query: 12/17/12 - New rule also indicates status of Ordered for Quality Measures Dashboard Initiated order for E1
documentation.impact:
The following needs to be addressed at each client site:
ALL ACTIONS
VALUE1 Needs to be reinstantiated
documentation.keywords: NHQM VTE 6 Incidence of Potentially Preventable VTE Quality Measures PowerPlan v4 0 VTE has been confirmed by Diagnostic testing

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_E
templateDefinitions.definition: an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DIAGNOSIS_E
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_DIAGNOSIS with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_CLINICAL_SERVICE, OPT_DX_TYPE, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_RANK, OPT_CERTAINTY were ACTION_TYPE. Optionally narrow diagnosis matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DIAGNOSIS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_DIAGNOSIS exist with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_CLINICAL_SERVICE, OPT_DX_TYPE, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_CONTRIBUTOR_SYSTEM, OPT_RANK, OPT_CERTAINTY, for encounter OPT_LINK. Optionally narrow diagnosis matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.
